sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"> <sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <includes/> <macroponent display_value="Article page">5a177aeb4c132110876373a4ee204d4a</macroponent> <name>setFeedbackReason</name> <preset/> <required_translations>[ ]</required_translations> <script><![CDATA[/** * @param {params} params * @param {api} params.api * @param {any} params.event * @param {any} params.imports */ function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) { var selectedReasons = []; selectedReasons.push(event.payload.item.id); api.setState("selectedReason", () => selectedReasons); }]]></script> <script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version> <sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-06-14 11:48:09</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d2177aebc2132110f1c9e7f16a5afa4a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>setFeedbackReason</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Flow Finder" source="x_350851_flow_fi_0">18d672eb97132110974bbf1e6253afc8</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Flow Finder">18d672eb97132110974bbf1e6253afc8</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d2177aebc2132110f1c9e7f16a5afa4a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-06-14 11:48:09</sys_updated_on> <target/> <type/> </sys_ux_client_script> </record_update>
